description: Learn Python programming concepts through interactive examples.

lessons.title: Introduction to Python
lessons.content: Get started with Python programming language.

lessons.title: Python Syntax and Variables
lessons.content: Learn Python syntax and how to work with variables.

lessons.title: Data Types and Operators
lessons.content: Understand Python data types and operators.

lessons.title: Control Flow
lessons.content: Use conditional statements and loops in Python.

lessons.title: Loops
lessons.content: Master different types of loops in Python.

lessons.title: Functions and Modules
lessons.content: Create reusable code with functions and modules.

lessons.title: Data Structures
lessons.content: Work with lists, tuples, dictionaries, and sets.

lessons.title: File Handling
lessons.content: Read from and write to files in Python.

lessons.title: Exception Handling
lessons.content: Handle errors gracefully with exception handling.

lessons.title: Object-Oriented Programming
lessons.content: Implement object-oriented programming concepts in Python.

lessons.title: Python Libraries
lessons.content: Work with popular Python libraries.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Guessing Game
lessons.content: Build a complete guessing game using Python.

lessons.title: List Comprehensions
lessons.content: Create concise and efficient lists with list comprehensions.

lessons.title: File I/O and Exception Handling
lessons.content: Advanced file operations and robust error handling.

lessons.title: Functions, Arguments, and Lambda
lessons.content: Master function parameters, arguments, and lambda functions.

lessons.title: OOP (Classes, Objects, Inheritance)
lessons.content: Deep dive into object-oriented programming concepts.

lessons.title: Working with Modules and Packages
lessons.content: Organize code with modules and packages effectively.

lessons.title: Dictionaries and Sets Deep Dive
lessons.content: Explore advanced features of dictionaries and sets.

lessons.title: Virtual Environments (concept only)
lessons.content: Understand virtual environments for project isolation.

lessons.title: Data Visualization (basic overview)
lessons.content: Introduction to data visualization with Python libraries.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Password Generator
lessons.content: Create a secure password generator application.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Guess the Number Game
lessons.content: Enhance the guessing game with advanced Python features.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Expense Tracker
lessons.content: Build a complete expense tracking application.

lessons.title: Data Structures Deep Dive
lessons.content: Deep dive into advanced data structures like stacks, queues, linked lists, and trees.

lessons.title: File Reading/Writing Simulation
lessons.content: Simulate file operations in the browser environment using JavaScript-based Python interpreters.

lessons.title: Exception Handling and Logging
lessons.content: Implement robust error handling and logging mechanisms for better debugging and monitoring.

lessons.title: OOP â€” Inheritance, Polymorphism, Encapsulation
lessons.content: Master the three pillars of object-oriented programming with practical examples.

lessons.title: List Comprehensions & Generators
lessons.content: Create efficient and readable code using list comprehensions and generator expressions.

lessons.title: Modules & Libraries Overview (os, random, datetime)
lessons.content: Explore commonly used Python standard library modules for system operations, randomness, and time handling.

lessons.title: Functions & Recursion
lessons.content: Master function design patterns and recursive algorithms for problem-solving.

lessons.title: Basic Data Visualization (concept only)
lessons.content: Understand data visualization concepts and libraries like matplotlib (simulated in browser).

lessons.title: Regex in Python
lessons.content: Use regular expressions for pattern matching and text processing in Python.

lessons.title: Mini Project: BMI Calculator
lessons.content: Create a BMI calculator with input validation and health recommendations.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Password Generator
lessons.content: Build an advanced password generator with customizable options and security features.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Quiz Game
lessons.content: Develop a complete quiz game with multiple categories, scoring, and persistent high scores.

questions.question: Which keyword is used to define a function in Python?
Which data type is mutable in Python?
How do you start a comment in Python?
